alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 11:50AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Jackson, Gadsden, southern Decatur, southwestern Grady and central Seminole Counties through 1230 PM EDT/1130 AM CDT/... At 1150 AM EDT/1050 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Chattahoochee, or 16 miles southwest of Bainbridge, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Midway, Quincy, Havana, Chattahoochee, Sneads, Gretna, Greenwood, Attapulgus, Douglas City, Florence, Jamieson, Recovery, Lovedale, Laingkat, Calvary, Dellwood, Quincy Airport, Buena Vista, Mount Pleasant and Hardaway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
